sourcesContent:
import React,{useRef,useState} from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup} from "reactstrap" import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} =useParams(); const reviewMsgRef=useRef('') const [tourRating,setTourRating]=useState(null) // later use backend const tour=tourData.find(tour=>tour.id===id) const {photo,title,desc,price,address,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize}=tour const {totalRating,avgRating} =calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options ={day:'numeric',month:'long',year:'numeric'} return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating===0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating===0?( 'Not rated '):(({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price} / per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*tour reviews section */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews )

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
Suhaib

{new Date('01-18-2023').toLocaleDateString ( 'en-US',options)}

5
Amazing tour
)) }
{/*tour reviews section end */}
) } export default TourDetails
